name: mattermost
description: Mattermost is an open-source collaboration and messaging platform for teams. It offers chat, file sharing, integrations, and compliance tooling with enterprise features that can be deployed self-hosted or as SaaS.
features: Team messaging: Organize conversations in channels for teams, projects, or topics with threaded replies.
Direct messaging: Send private messages to individuals or create group conversations.
File sharing: Upload and share documents, images, and files with inline previews and search.
Video calls: Start voice and video calls directly from channels or direct messages.
Integrations: Connect with hundreds of tools including Jira, GitHub, GitLab, and Zoom.
Custom slash commands: Create shortcuts for common actions or integrate with external services.
Mobile apps: Access Mattermost on iOS and Android with full feature parity to desktop.
Search functionality: Find messages, files, and conversations using powerful search with filters.
Compliance features: Meet regulatory requirements with data retention, e-discovery, and audit logs.
Role-based permissions: Control access to channels and features based on user roles and teams.
Custom branding: Customize the interface with your organization's colors, logos, and themes.
High availability: Deploy in clustered configurations for enterprise-grade reliability and scale.
